mapper.select: select * from payment where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into payment(actual_price, pay_channel, is_successful, pay_time, pay_sn, begin_time, order_id, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified) values (#{actualPrice},#{payChannel},#{isSuccessful},now(),#{paySn},now(),#{orderId},#{isDeleted},now(),now())
